channel.title: HTTP on jdhao's blog
channel.description: Recent content in HTTP on jdhao's blog

item.title: Build Web API with Flask --- Work with JSON-like Dict
item.description: This is a simple post about how to send JSON-like Dict data to a Flask server via requests package.

item.title: Build Web API with Flask -- Post and Receive Image
item.description: In this post, I want to write about how to build a simple image processing web API that returns the size of an image. The topics include how to build this web API with Flask and how to post image to this web API and get response.

item.title: Build A Web API Service Using Flask -- The Basics
item.description: Web API is a kind of web application. Simply put, web APIs are built for other applications to get info from the web server. For Python, Flask can be used to build web applications. In this post, I want to share how to build web APIs with Flask.
